A lot of the data collected by NASA space probes are publicly available from example:

[spdf.gsfc.nasa.gov](https://spdf.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/data)

Here is a collection of some of investigation of the data.

All [the code is available on GitHub](https://github.com/orri93/analysis/tree/master/etc/astronomy)

# [Pioneer 10](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pioneer_10)

## Charged Particle Instrument (CPI) Data

![Pioneer 10 CPI](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/archive/9/9a/20110203223202%21Pioneer_10-11_-_P52a_-_fx.jpg)

* [Charged Particles around Jupiter](https://orri.blob.core.windows.net/reports/inspect-pioneer10-cpi-jupiter.html)
* [Charged Particles throughout the mission](https://orri.blob.core.windows.net/reports/inspect-pioneer10-cpi-dist-1.html)
